dotnetType.name: ISchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
Builds Avro schemas for specific type resolutions. Used by <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilder" /> to
            break apart schema building logic.

overloads.summary:
Builds a schema for a type resolution. If the case does not apply to the provided
            resolution, this method should throw <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />.

typeSignatures.value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISchemaBuilderCase
